title: Pogačar, Vingegaard and how to bridge the gap in a Tour de France ‘with two aliens’
content:
Tadej Pogačar and Jonas Vingegaard are riding away from the GC pack in this Tour, but their rivals vow to catch back.

Read the full article at Pogačar, Vingegaard and how to bridge the gap in a Tour de France ‘with two aliens’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
